Package Model

Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
Model.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection extends Object
Represents a connection to the application database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DB_NAME
    The key containing the database's name.
    static final String
    DB_PASSWORD
    The key containing the database's password.
    static final String
    DB_PORT
    The key containing the database's port.
    static final String
    DB_URL
    The key containing the database's url.
    static final String
    DB_USE_SSL
    The key indicating whether the useSSL option should be true (Default: false}).
    static final String
    DB_USER
    The key containing the database's username.
    static final String
    URL_TEMPLATE
    The template used for the url to establish the Database connection.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromFile

      public static DatabaseConnection loadFromFile(InputStream configFileStream) throws IOException, SQLException
      Reads the text in configFileStream into a Properties object and passes the result to getConnection(Properties).
      Parameters:
      configFileStream - stream to a textfile containing the required properties.
      Returns:
      The result of getConnection(Properties).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occured while reading from configFileStream.
      SQLException - If the database connection fails
      See Also:
      • getConnection(Properties)

    • getConnection

      public static DatabaseConnection getConnection(Properties dbConfig) throws NullPointerException, NumberFormatException, SQLException

      Uses the data in dbConfig(@see DatabaseConnection(java.sql.Connection)) to establish a single connection with the DriverManager. This method will not establish a new connection even if the properties are changed.

      Parameters:
      dbConfig - the configuration to use for the connection
      Returns:
      The instance of DatabaseConnection(Connection) for this java application.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - If the db.port value is not a number
      SQLException - If the database connection fails
      NullPointerException

    • prepare

      public PreparedStatement prepare(String query) throws SQLException
      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - a valid SQL statement.
      Returns:
      the created PreparedStatement.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
